name: CGPattern
desc: A 2D pattern to be used for drawing graphics paths.

items.name: init?(info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, bounds: CGRect, matrix: CGAffineTransform, xStep: CGFloat, yStep: CGFloat, tiling: CGPatternTiling, isColored: Bool, callbacks: UnsafePointer<CGPatternCallbacks>)
enum CGPatternTiling
items.desc: Different methods for rendering a tiled pattern.

items.name: struct CGPatternCallbacks
items.desc: A structure that holds a version and two callback functions for drawing a custom pattern.

items.name: typealias CGPatternReleaseInfoCallback
items.desc: Release private data or resources associated with the pattern.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the type identifier for Core Graphics patterns.
